artist: Engraver: Richard Earlom; Draftsman: after Claude de Lorraine; Publisher: John Boydell; Printer: W. Bulmer & Co.
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: LL, in margin below image, lettered: Claude le Lorrain delin't. / No. 1. | BC, in margin below image, lettered: published Jan. 1st 1774 by John Boydell Engraver in Cheapside. / From the Original Drawing, in the Collection of the Duke of Devonshire. | LR, in margin below image, lettered: R. Earlom fecit.
title: A View in Rome with the Temple of Jupiter Stator and the Colosseum
